scripts.deployFrontend: ssh pi@%npm_package_remoteMachine% 'rm -rf ~/frontend' && scp -r ./dist pi@%npm_package_remoteMachine%:~/frontend && ssh pi@%npm_package_remoteMachine% './scripts/reload_fullpageos_txt'
scripts.deployBackend: ssh pi@%npm_package_remoteMachine% 'rm -rf ~/backend' && rm -rf ./backend/__pycache__ && scp -r ./backend pi@%npm_package_remoteMachine%:~/backend && ssh pi@%npm_package_remoteMachine% 'systemctl --user restart backend.service'
